questions.question: How did the Prophet ﷺ describe the major signs when they begin appearing?
options: They will come quickly one after another like beads falling from a broken necklace
They will appear slowly over many centuries
They will happen all at once on one day
They will appear in reverse order

questions.question: What is the purpose of learning about the major signs of the End Times?
options: To predict exactly when they will happen
To prepare for the Hereafter by increasing good deeds and strengthening faith

questions.question: According to Qur'an 54:1, what has already happened as a sign?
options: The sun has risen from the west
The Hour has come near, and the moon has split in two

questions.question: What makes the major signs different from other events?
options: They are small and hard to notice
They are extraordinary events that have never happened before

questions.question: What will be distributed fairly during the Mahdi's leadership?
options: Wealth, so no one will be in need

questions.question: How long will the Mahdi rule according to authentic hadith?
What will Prophet ʿĪsā do when he descends during the Mahdi's time?
options: He will become the new leader
He will pray behind the Mahdi

questions.question: Where will the Mahdi come from?
options: From the Prophet's ﷺ family, with the name Muhammad ﷺ ibn Abdullah
From a distant land unknown to Muslims

questions.question: What protects believers from the Dajjāl's deception?
According to Sahih Muslim 2946, how significant is the trial of the Dajjāl?
options: It is one of many equal trials
It is only important for certain people
From the creation of Adam until the Hour, there is no matter greater than the Dajjāl
It is less important than other trials

questions.question: What physical characteristic will the Dajjāl have?
options: Blind in the right eye with the word 'disbeliever' written on his forehead

questions.question: How will the Dajjāl test people's faith?
options: What he calls Paradise will actually be Hell, and what he calls Hell will be Paradise
By offering them wealth and power
By challenging them to physical contests

questions.question: What will ʿĪsā break after defeating the Dajjāl?
Where will Prophet ʿĪsā descend from Heaven?
options: To a white minaret in Damascus

questions.question: Where will ʿĪsā kill the Dajjāl?
options: At the gate of Lud in Palestine

questions.question: According to Qur'an 43:61, what does ʿĪsā's return signify?
options: ʿĪsā will be a sign for the Hour
The beginning of a new era

questions.question: How will Allah destroy Yāʾjūj and Mājūj?
options: Allah will send worms that will kill them all overnight
A massive flood will drown them
Fire from the sky will consume them
The believers will defeat them in battle

questions.question: Where will ʿĪsā and the believers seek refuge from Yāʾjūj and Mājūj?
What happens every day before Yāʾjūj and Mājūj are released?
options: They dig through the barrier but cannot break through until Allah permits

questions.question: How numerous will Yāʾjūj and Mājūj be when they emerge?
options: So numerous their first group drinks a lake completely while their last group finds it empty

questions.question: What does the beast carry to mark people?
options: The staff of Prophet Musa and the seal of Prophet Sulayman

questions.question: What will happen to the faces of believers when the beast marks them?
According to Qur'an 27:82, what will the beast tell people?
options: That mankind did not believe with certainty in Allah's verses

questions.question: Where will the beast emerge from the earth?
What will most people do after Allah lifts the smoke?
options: Return to their disbelief and sins

questions.question: How will the smoke affect believers?
options: It will not touch them at all
Something like a common cold with discomfort

questions.question: According to Qur'an 44:10-11, what will the smoke do?
options: Bring a visible smoke covering the people; this is a painful punishment
Only affect the mountains and seas

questions.question: How long will the smoke cover the earth?
For how many days will the sun continue rising from the west?
What happens on the morning the sun rises from the west?
options: The door of repentance will close forever

questions.question: Who will benefit from believing after seeing the sun rise from the west?
options: Everyone who believes at that moment
Only those who were already righteous
No one who did not believe before that moment

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 4636, what will happen when people see the sun rising from the west?
options: They will all believe, but faith will not benefit those who had not believed before
Half will believe and half will disbelieve
No one will notice the change
Only the righteous will see it

questions.question: How many massive landslides will occur?
options: Three: one in the east, one in the west, and one in the Arabian Peninsula
Two: one in the north and one in the south
One massive landslide at the Kaaba

questions.question: Why will the three landslides occur according to the lesson?
options: As punishment for widespread evil, immorality, and rejection of Allah's guidance

questions.question: According to Sahih Bukhari 7121, what else will increase before the Hour?
What will happen to entire regions during the landslides?
options: They will be covered in water
They will sink into the ground

questions.question: How will the fire from Yemen travel?
options: Extremely fast, giving no time to escape
Slowly, allowing people to flee ahead of it
Only at night while people sleep

questions.question: What is the purpose of the fire from Yemen?
options: To drive all remaining people toward the place of final gathering

questions.question: When will the fire from Yemen appear in the sequence of signs?
options: In the middle of the signs
The last sign before the Day of Judgment itself begins

questions.question: According to Sahih Muslim 2901, where will the fire emerge from?
options: Yemen, driving the people to their place of gathering

questions.question: What will happen when Isrāfīl blows the trumpet the second time?
options: All of creation will be resurrected and brought back to life

questions.question: What happens to the mountains when the first trumpet is blown?
According to Qur'an 39:68, who will survive the first trumpet blast?
Where is Angel Isrāfīl positioned right now?
options: Ready with the trumpet at his lips, waiting for Allah's command

questions.question: What will Allah send to cause bodies to grow from the earth?
How will people be resurrected according to the hadith?
options: As they were at their best age

questions.question: What does Qur'an 39:68 say happens after the second trumpet is blown?
options: People will sleep for a thousand years
At once they will be standing, looking on

questions.question: Who will be resurrected on that day?
options: Everyone who ever lived: prophets, believers, disbelievers, and even animals

questions.question: How long will people stand before Allah on the Day of Judgment?
How will righteous people receive their book of deeds?
According to the lesson, what will everyone be questioned about?
options: Their time, wealth, knowledge, and how they treated their body

questions.question: What will happen to evildoers when they receive their book of deeds?
options: They will receive it in their right hand
They will receive it from above
They will not receive a book
They will receive it in their left hand behind their back
